TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 148
TEI.2.document_title: Juan Vicente Campos to Stephen F Austin, 11-29-1828

barker_notes.barker_summary: Juan Vicente Campos to Austin, Saltillo, November 29, 1828. Announcing his election to represent Coahuila and Texas in Congress and assuring Austin of his desire to promote interests of the colonies. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 148

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Juan Vicente Campos to Austin, Saltillo, November 29, 1828. Announcing his election to represent Coahuila and Texas in Congress and assuring Austin of his desire to promote interests of the colonies. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
